welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Lower Salford, a charming city known for its rich history and picturesque landscapes. We invite you to explore and discover all the hidden gems this city has to offer. Enjoy your stay in Lower Salford!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Wings Field Airport handles all commercial flights and services.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Wings Field Airport is for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pottstown/Limerick Airport serves all commercial flights and includes amenities such as shops, restaurants, and rental car services.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Pottstown/Limerick Airport caters to private and chartered flights, offering a more exclusive and personalized experience.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy complimentary WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Doylestown Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Doylestown Airport is reserved for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: Main terminal for commercial flights

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Terminal for private and charter flights

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at North Philadelphia Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at North Philadelphia Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lehigh Valley International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Lehigh Valley International Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A-West
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for American Airlines and American Eagle.

terminals.name: Terminal A-East
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for Air Canada, Alaska Airlines, and JetBlue.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for Delta Air Lines, Frontier Airlines, and Southwest Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for United Airlines and United Express.

terminals.name: Terminal D
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for American Airlines, American Eagle, and Spirit Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal E
terminals.description: Serves international flights for Aer Lingus, British Airways, Icelandair, Lufthansa, Qatar Airways, and other airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Chestercounty Carlson Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at Chestercounty Carlson Airport serves flights to and from international destinations.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Trenton Mercer Airport serves all commercial flights and is equipped with modern facilities for passenger convenience.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Trenton Mercer Airport caters to private and chartered flights, providing a luxurious and exclusive experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for passengers to stay connected during their travels.
